product_name: The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a comfort-enhancing front zipper, The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck long underwear top for men keeps you comfortable during outdoor activities in cold weather. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. Quarter-length zipper ventilates instantly. The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck long underwear top offers a relaxed fit that skims the body. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a comfort-enhancing front zipper, The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck long underwear top for men keeps you comfortable during outdoor activities in cold weather.
